description: Base class for publication, see subclasses for detailed descriptions.

contents.name: DisplayName
contents.description: The display name of the publication.

contents.name: Description
contents.description: A short discription about the publication and its content.

contents.name: Category
contents.description: Indicates to what category this publication belongs.

contents.name: AvailableFrom
contents.description: Start date/time for data to be shared (inclusive). (optional)
contents.comment: Inclusive means that values starting from inclusive (>=) From will be included in the range.

contents.name: AvailableUntil
contents.description: End date/time for data to be shared (exclusive). (optional)
contents.comment: Exclusive means that only values before (<) To will be included in the range.

contents.name: TermsOfUsage
contents.description: The Terms Of Usage that apply.

contents.name: PublicationDate
contents.description: The date/time when the publication was created.
